issue.title: Gazebo 6 conflicts with rviz because of ogre 1.8/1.9 dependency on Ubuntu

content.raw:
Rviz devs replied that there was an agreement between ros and gazebo that indigo will use libogre-1.8 and jade libogre-1.9: https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rep/pull/89#issuecomment-69232117.
So i guess updating gazebo6-dev dependency to ```libogre-1.8 | libogre-1.9``` will fix that.
